scripts.build-all: find ../backend -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 4 -type f -name 'package.json' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -not -path '*/extension/*' -exec echo '🚧 Building {}' ; -execdir sh -c 'npm run build' ; && echo '🚧 Building ../docs/package.json'  && npm run build --prefix ../docs
scripts.deploy: npm run build-all && echo '🚀 Deploying backend' && npm run cdk -- deploy --all --require-approval=never --profile task-genie-stage --context envName=stage
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-all && echo '🚀 Deploying backend' && npm run cdk -- deploy --all --require-approval=never --profile task-genie-prod --context envName=prod
scripts.build-backend: find ../backend -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 4 -type f -name 'package.json' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -not -path '*/extension/*' -exec echo '🚧 Building {}' ; -execdir sh -c 'npm run build' ;
scripts.install-all: find ../backend -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 4 -type f -name 'package.json' -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -exec echo '🛠️ Installing {}' ; -execdir sh -c 'npm install' ; && echo '🛠️ Installing ./docs/package.json' && npm install --prefix ../docs
